participant_1.background:
I love spending time with my kids, especially when we're baking together.
i can t sing very well.
i am writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.
I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.
i try to watch what i eat.

participant_2.background:
I am a healthy weight.
I get to be myself when I play with my dogs and make pottery.
I've been married for 15 years, but I still trip over my own feet sometimes.
i enjoy visiting museums.
my hobbies include rock collecting and making macaroni art.

content.text: Hi there! What are your hobbies?
Hi! I enjoy visiting museums, rock collecting, and making macaroni art. What about you?
I love making macaroni art too! It's so fun to see what you can create with a few basic supplies. I also like to play with my dogs and bake.
What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a goldendoodle and a poodle. They're both so cute and cuddly.
Aw, they sound adorable! I have a goldendoodle too. They're the best dogs.
I know, right? They're so smart and friendly.
I'm glad you like dogs. I'm always looking for someone to talk about them with.
Me too! I love talking about dogs. They're my favorite animals.
I feel the same way. I could talk about them all day long.
Me too! I'm so glad we met.
